title: Biggest Book of Bread Machine Recipes
description: More than 400 recipes, including basic loaves, savory breads, sweet favorites, and holiday classics.Holiday-worthy butters and spreads to pair with your favorite breads.Two bonus chapters on Soups & Stews and Sandwiches offer more recipes and suggestions for enjoying delicious homemade breads.Basics chapter that takes the guesswork out of bread machine baking and includes a troubleshooting guide and substitution suggestions.
author: Carrie Holcomb
